mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.gonggao_laoshi_name as gonggaoLaoshiName ,a.gonggao_laoshi_types as gonggaoLaoshiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.gonggao_laoshi_content as gonggaoLaoshiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM gonggao_laoshi a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and a.gonggao_laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.gonggaoLaoshiName},'%')
and a.gonggao_laoshi_types = #{params.gonggaoLaoshiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.gonggao_laoshi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.gonggaoLaoshiContent},'%')
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
